query: SELECT ID, MUID, VersionName, VersionNumber, Version_ID, VersionFlag, Name, Code, ChangeTrackingMask, Active_Code, Active_Name, Active_ID, Controller, Whitelist, [Trust Data_Code] AS Trust_Data_Code, [Trust Data_Name] AS Trust_Data_Name, [Trust Data_ID] AS Trust_Data_ID, [Connection Type_Code] AS Connection_Type_Code, [Connection Type_Name] AS Connection_Type_Name, [Connection Type_ID] AS Connection_Type_ID, [Landing Folder] AS Landing_Folder, [Archive Folder] AS Archive_Folder, [Error Folder] AS Error_Folder, [Busy Folder] AS Busy_Folder, DebtorReporting_Code, DebtorReporting_Name, DebtorReporting_ID, SalesReporting_Code, SalesReporting_Name, SalesReporting_ID, StockReporting_Code, StockReporting_Name, StockReporting_ID, PayablesReporting_Code, PayablesReporting_Name, PayablesReporting_ID, EnterDateTime, EnterUserName, EnterVersionNumber, LastChgDateTime, LastChgUserName, LastChgVersionNumber, ValidationStatus FROM mdm.Companies
